titles.title: A bill to provide relief for all air carriers with pension plans that are not frozen pension plans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Introduced. Amends the Pension Protection Act of 2006 to require commercial passenger airline pension plan sponsors electing not to utilitze the alternative funding schedule to use an interest rate of 8.25% in determining the funding target for each of the 10 plan years (rather than the segmented interest rates calculated on the basis of the corporate bond yield curve).
